solution_line_template: Heather has sewn {already_sewn_aprongs} x {multiplier_today} = <<{already_sewn_aprongs}*{multiplier_today}={aprongs_sewn_today}>>{aprongs_sewn_today} aprons today.
The total number of aprons sewn is {already_sewn_aprongs} + {aprongs_sewn_today} = <<{already_sewn_aprongs}+{aprongs_sewn_today}={total_aprongs_sewn}>>{total_aprongs_sewn}.
Heather needs to sew {total_needed_aprongs} - {total_aprongs_sewn} = <<{total_needed_aprongs}-{total_aprongs_sewn}={remaining_aprongs_needed}>>{remaining_aprongs_needed} aprons more.
So, she needs to sew {remaining_aprongs_needed}/{tomorrow_divisor} = <<{remaining_aprongs_needed}/{tomorrow_divisor}={aprongs_for_tomorrow}>>{aprongs_for_tomorrow} aprons tomorrow.
